name: Findsome & Winmore
description:
Findsome & Winmore was founded in 1995 by Matt Certo in his Rollins College dorm room. With the coaching of his father, Sam, the company grew steadily through the years through a focus on web design & programming. As the company grew, the needs of its clients expanded dramatically beyond just web design. The firm added a wealth of skill in areas like brand marketing strategy, social media marketing, search marketing and advertising and public relations.
In 2014, the firm re-branded as Findsome & Winmore: The Classic Digital Marketing Agency. The new name was a hat tip to the yesteryear of marketing where some tried and true marketing fundamentals were established.
